other_tests.findings: 1+ (<1 per 1000X FIELD): POLYMORPHONUCLEAR LEUKOCYTES. NO MICROORGANISMS SEEN.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Post-procedure CT demonstrated marked interval collapse in the size of the fluid collection. A moderate-sized hematoma was noted in the right piriformis muscle, with no change in size noted on final CT.

other_tests.findings: Preprocedure CT scan demonstrated several fluid collections, with the largest in the deep pelvis anterior to the rectum.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Post-procedure limited CT confirmed the pigtail catheter was well located within the pelvic collection, with marked interval collapse.

other_tests.findings: Approximately 10 cc of serous fluid was aspirated and sent for microbiology analysis.
